title: Please, Please help identify font! THANK YOU!
content:
Need Help With Identifying The Font Used In The Logo For Santa Barbara Bank & Trust! See It HERE

author: albionhome

comments.content: Didn’t you already post this in the TYPE ID section? The type experts here are kind enough to help with this, you needn’t flood the board with your request, it’s rather rude.
I appologize, I don’t know how this all works...and am under a deadline at the office...Sorry!
